@Rainsong No prob. Translators rarely bother to comment on nhentai, so when I saw you responding to all the people dumping on this work, I knew you could use some encouragement. Besides, I always appreciate it when someone translates works featuring some of the more degenerate fetishes, heh. :)
There is such a thing as too much exposition. I couldn't get into the story because of it was just too much.

@Ok123456789 true, I was more having fun writing something salty than trying to make a valid argument and I agree with what you say although I do imagine that there are some that subconsciously imagine that they're the woman being raped.
Her resistance and successive spiral into agony... aaaaahh fuuuuck this gave me an eye watering orgasm. 10/10

@ndus: Thanks, the support is appreciated. My next work I have planned is in the same vein but from a different author, so keep an eye out for that. And there's a chapter two I'm gonna work on at a later time, so look forward to that too. I suggest following my socials for updates so you don't miss them. :)

@zerobero12: That's fine, no need to apologize :) I translate other things, too. If you'd like, you can click my profile and find my other works I have previously translated. Or you can just search Rainsong and find it there, too. I've worked on a few "vanilla" things as well, so it's not like this is all I do. On top of that, you can commission me to work on something else, too. Otherwise, I'm not generally going to care much what you think about what I translate on my own free time, as you haven't paid me to do anything else.
@Rainsong Keep doing your thing, man. This is good shit.

@L0lic0nwizard, ayo u're back?

@voidtraveler: Not saying that, but rather that there are worse things you could complain about. If you wish to complain, go there. And as general advice to you, if you don't like anything along these lines then blacklist the tags you don't like. I'm actually trying to help you.
@Rainsong "That guy makes worse stuff so this shit is totally okay." Cool logic bruv. Lol.

Anyway, to anyone else who likes stuff like this, consider following my twitter or wordpress, donating a ko-fi, or commissioning me for a work. I'm also open to just plain suggestions too, but I won't guarantee getting around to them anytime soon. I'm generally open to most tags too, but if there's anything I won't work on I'll let you know beforehand.
This is hot

To anyone complaining about this work, I'd just like to remind everyone that there are plenty of other artists who create more depressing or shocking content on a near monthly basis. Trying to complain about something as tame as this is really the wrong fight to even try and fight. It's really no better than the people who go specifically onto NTR works and complain about it being NTR. It doesn't make sense. If you don't like the content, then blacklist the tags and move on, please. You can see the tags as clearly as anyone else. The only reason why I can fathom someone would do something so nonsensical is because they secretly like the content but don't want to admit it to themselves, so they get a moral high from trying to make others feel bad about liking it too. It not only doesn't work, but it also makes you look hypocritical. That's all I'll say on it. Thank you and have a nice day.
Kimoi.

Hey all, translator here. Just stopping by to say a few things. 1) Support the artist if you can. Link here: https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ216999.html 2) I already have chapter two on my list of things I'm working on next. For updates you can follow me at any of my socials. @RainsongTL on twitter or Rainsongtranslations.wordpress.com 3) consider supporting my artist friend as well at www.ko-fi.com/sevixfremy He drew my avatar and could us extra support due to extenuating circumstances. He also takes commissions. Thanks for your time.
